SA20bsa022_u:3: Vvṛ_2 na deśakālaniyamaḥ santānāniyamo na ca /
SA20bsa022_u:4: na ca kṛtyakriyā yuktā vijñaptiryadi nārthataḥ //
SA20bsa022_u:9: Vvṛ_5 tiraścāṃ sambhavaḥ svarge yathā ca narake tathā /
SA20bsa022_u:10: na pretānāṃ yatastajjaṃ duḥkhaṃ nānubhavanti te //
SA20bsa022_u:14: tatraiva neṣyate yatra vāsanā kiṃ nu kāraṇaṃ //
SA20bsa022_u:19: Vvṛ_10 tathā pudgalanairātmyapraveśo hi anyathā punaḥ /
SA20bsa022_u:21: Vvṛ_11 na tadekaṃ na cānekaṃ viṣayaḥ paramāṇuśaḥ /
SA20bsa022_u:22: na ca te saṃhatā yasmātparamāṇurna sidhyati //
SA20bsa022_u:27: Vvṛ_14 dibhāgabhedo yasyāsti tasyaikatvaṃ na yujyate /
SA20bsa022_u:28: chāyāvṛtī kathaṃ vā anyo na piṇḍaścenna tasya te //
SA20bsa022_u:31: Vvṛ_16 pratyakṣabuddhiḥ svapnādau yathā sa ca yadā tadā /
SA20bsa022_u:32: na so 'rtho dṛśyate tasya pratyakṣatvaṃ kathaṃ mataṃ //
SA20bsa022_u:33: Vvṛ_17 uktaṃ yathā tadābhāsā vijñaptiḥ smaraṇaṃ tataḥ /
SA20bsa022_u:40: manodaṇḍo mahāvadyaḥ kathaṃ vā tena sidhyati //
SA20bsa022_u:44: kṛteyaṃ sarvathā sā tu na cintyā buddhagocaraḥ //
